proficiency_level_definition: ? Applies the competency in the simplest situations ? Requires close and extensive guidance ? Demonstrates awareness of concepts and processes
behavioral_illustrations: ? Monitors customers or clients satisfaction to ensure they are getting what they need in a timely manner ? Establishes and maintains relationships with customers ? Updates agency website to reflect changes to services
